claim: The Harry Potter series has been criticized in many languages.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone , along with the rest of the Harry Potter series , has been attacked by several religious groups and banned in some countries because of accusations that the novels promote witchcraft , but other religious commentators have written that the book exemplifies important viewpoints , including the power of self-sacrifice and the ways in which people 's decisions shape their personalities .
